Introduction to Metadata Value of Metadata
Introduction to Metadata
Value of Metadata

An overview of the value of metadata to geospatial data distribution, data management and project management.

geospatial data distribution, data
management and project management.

Intro to Metadata: Value of Metadata

Learning Objectives
Learning Objectives

After completing this module the student can: explain the geospatial data distribution role of metadata explain the geospatial data management role of metadata explain the geospatial project role of metadata make the business case for metadata implementation
After completing this module the student can:
explain the geospatial data distribution role of metadata
explain the geospatial data management role of
metadata
explain the geospatial project role of metadata
make the business case for metadata implementation

Distribution: Data Discovery
Distribution: Data Discovery

The descriptive content of the metadata file can be used to identify, assess and access available data resources.

can be used to identify, assess and access
available data resources.

Management: Data Accountability
Management: Data Accountability

Metadata is an exercise in data
Metadata is an exercise in data

accountability. It requires you to assess:
accountability. It requires you to assess:

What do you know about the data set? What don’t you know about the data set? What should you know about the data set?
What do you know about the data set?
What don’t you know about the data set?
What should you know about the data set?

Are you willing to associate yourself with the metadata record ?
Are you willing to associate yourself with the
metadata record ?

Project Management: Contract Deliverables
Project Management:
Contract Deliverables

As a key component of the data, metadata
As a key component of the data, metadata

should be part of any data deliverable
should be part of any data deliverable

For best quality metadata, provide:
For best quality metadata, provide:

classification and/or validation schema metadata content template metadata specification manual
classification and/or validation schema
metadata content template
metadata specification manual

Provide a sample metadata record if possible
Provide a sample metadata record if possible

Conclusions
Conclusions

Metadata is simply information about data Information that you need
Metadata is simply information about data
Information that you need

to effectively: locate manage utilize
to effectively:
locate
manage
utilize

internal and external data resources.
internal and external data resources.

Creation of robust metadata is in your OWN best interest!
Creation of robust metadata is in your OWN best
interest!
